summary: A chicken based nuclear steel arrow shooting destruction device.
descriptionHtml:
****WARNING!*****
Use at your own risk! make a save backup, and please note that the weapon will ONLY work properly with steel arrows. Also, please note that all steel arrows had been um.....modified...
=======================================================================================
UPDATE:
Sorry, i forgot to include the meshes in the first release :3....i truly am an idiot.


Features:
Adds a Hyper Atomic chicken cannon to the players inventory when the mod is loaded up. It will only work properly with steel arrows. Please note that it may f*ck up your game a tad.

CHANGELOG:
V1-Added Mod
V1 Updated-Added meshes
author: GOXSTRAP
